children.value: This starter is boilerplate for (technical) documentation websites optionally accomponied by a blog (you can use it forever you want of course).

npm install gatsby -g
gatsby new my-docs https://github.com/jannikbuschke/gatsby-antd-docs
cd my-docs
npm run start
Fix menu item links not showing active state
In order to host the site the
needs to be put into gatsby-config.js export object on to the property
and copy the content of the public folder to the webspace.
